briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of SAGE-217 in the Treatment of Adult Participants With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluating the Efficacy of SAGE-217 in the Treatment of Adult Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This study is a phase 3, multicenter, double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled study evaluating the efficacy of SAGE-217 in the treatment of adult participants with major depressive disorder (MDD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the 17-item HAM-D Total Score at Day 15
